titleStmt.title: The exposition, and readynges of Iohn Keltridge: Mayster of the Artes: student of late in Trinitie Colledge in Cambridge, minister, preacher, and pastor of the Church of Dedham, that is in Essex: vpon the wordes of our Sauiour Christe, that bée written in the. xi. of Luke
titleStmt.author: Keltridge, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: By William How, for Abraham Veale,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The expositions of I. Keltridge vpon the. xi. of Luke.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
